column1: This is not intended to stoke panic, but to just circulate information currently in need of circulation.A Nepali woman (19) was just confirmed as Nepal's latest, and currently only, case of COVID-19. Authorities are asking anyone who arrived on March 17 aboard Qatar Flight 650 to contact the department of health and population for testing.
The 19-year-old woman who returned from France via Qatar tests positive for Covid-19 https://kathmandupost.com/health/2020/03/23/â€¦
